title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection is not registered.

OB: 

EB: The item can be selected when attempting to select it again for the second time.

SR: 
1. Create a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
